coverLetter:
My name is Michael Morton and I saw your job posting on Craigslist. I’ve attached my resume in pdf format as well as in the body of this email. I think I would be a great fit for your cannabis company as I am very detail oriented and check my work 2-3 times before completion, while also having experience with handling cash transactions in more than one business setting. In these different settings I learned to interact with different clientele of different business settings and cultural backgrounds, which helped me learn to read different situations that may arise and handle them accordingly to appease both customers and the business. I am a fast learner and have a real passion to learn the business behind medical/recreational marijuana and the future ahead for the industry. I would feel content at the end of each day knowing I helped further a patients knowledge of a cannabis strain or broaden their different options on consuming their flowers, oils, shatters, wax, crumble, or edibles. My goal is to treat your dispensary as an extension of myself putting it forth in the best light. 

MICHAEL S. MORTON
 Sean5788@gmail.com
